mapper.select: select b.bookTitle, b.author, b.type, b.publisher, b.pubYear, b.imagePath, bst.bookNo, bst.rentStatus, bst.reserveStatus from book b inner join bookStatus bst on b.bookCode = bst.bookCode where b.bookCode=#{bookCode};
select count(*) from renthistory where id=#{id} and returnDate is null;
